title: Prerequisites & Setup
subtitle: Initial requirements and system configuration
content:
Prerequisites Checklist

Before beginning the vendor spend analysis process, ensure all prerequisites are met and systems are properly configured.

System Requirements

Data Requirements

Minimum Data Fields Required

  • Vendor Name
  • Vendor ID/Number
  • Invoice Number
  • Invoice Date
  • PO Number
  • Line Item Description
  • Spend Amount
  • GL Account
  • Cost Center
  • Department

Access & Permissions

Team Setup

Required Team Members

  • Data Analyst: Primary person conducting analysis
  • Business SME: Category expertise and validation
  • IT Support: System access and technical issues
  • Project Manager: Timeline and deliverables tracking

Initial Setup Steps

  1. Create Project Folder Structure
    ProjectName/
├── 01_RawData/
├── 02_CleanedData/
├── 03_Analysis/
├── 04_Dashboard/
├── 05_Documentation/
└── 06_Archive/
  2. Configure Power BI Settings
    • Set data source privacy levels
    • Configure auto-recovery options
    • Set regional settings for currency
  3. Establish Communication Channels
    • Create Teams channel or Slack workspace
    • Schedule weekly status meetings
    • Set up shared calendar for milestones

Important: Do not proceed to data collection until all prerequisites are confirmed. Missing requirements will cause delays in later phases.
